title: Blended Text-Audio Interaction Class Design for Second Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math terminology and ability to construct simple sentences
context.additional_context: Conducting blended language-integrated learning using personal devices in BYOD environments. Students possess beginner-level second language (French/English) proficiency and practice target language use during mathematical problem-solving processes

learning_goals: Learners can communicate by combining text chat and audio interactions in a second language when solving mathematical problems.
Learners can provide corrective feedback on lexical errors from peers' spoken utterances via text chat with 80% accuracy.
Learners can fluently present explanations of mathematical concepts for over 5 minutes using a blended interaction mode (audio + text).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
